title: Bug 18335 - Perspective contents lost when view is maximized
description: When maximizing the view, perspective contents are lost upon closing the workbench.
OB: Upon closing the workbench after maximizing the view, the perspective contents are lost, and a temporary layout seems to be persisting instead of the proper layout.
EB: The proper layout should persist when the workbench is closed, even if the view was maximized temporarily.
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to a perspective.
2. Maximize the view within the perspective.
3. Close the workbench.
4. Reopen the application and check if the proper layout is maintained.
